subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Michael Vick was fined $10,000 by the National Football League and agreed to donate another $10,000 to charity for making an obscene hand gesture toward Falcons fans after last weekend’s loss to New Orleans.
snippet: Michael Vick was fined $10,000 by the National Football League and agreed to donate another $10,000 to charity for making an obscene hand gesture toward Falcons fans after last weekend’s loss to New Orleans.
